rukus.text: yawma naqulu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqulu hal min mazidin
hadha ma tuʿaduna likulli awwabin hafizin
man khashiya l-rahmana bil-ghaybi wajaa biqalbin munibin
lahum ma yashauna fiha waladayna mazidun
wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum batshan fanaqqabu fi l-biladi hal min mahisin
inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa l-samʿa wahuwa shahidun
walaqad khalaqna l-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughubin
fa-is'bir ʿala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tuluʿi l-shamsi waqabla l-ghurubi
wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunadi l-munadi min makanin qaribin
yawma yasmaʿuna l-sayhata bil-haqi dhalika yawmu l-khuruji
inna nahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wa-ilayna l-masiru
yawma tashaqqaqu l-ardu ʿanhum siraʿan dhalika hashrun ʿalayna yasirun
nahnu aʿlamu bima yaquluna wama anta ʿalayhim bijabbarin fadhakkir bil-qur'ani man yakhafu waʿidi
